https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/4qF8PmqmLSrqf81Zk2GgXa9knz2.jpg When Lucy wakes up with a wedding dress in hand, she believes that she is late to her wedding with her ex-boyfriend Zac. However, she has no recollection of the past 2 years, including the fact that she is engaged to another man. Christmas On My Mind
